A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While The Last Jedi delivers some incredibly awesome visuals\, the movie itself is very lack luster. A poor script\, essentially stolen from the other movies\, while the actual new lines are nearly similar to childish banter. Nothing about this movie is surprising as it was easily the most predictable\, more so than the prequels when people knew how it would end. In all\, this movie truly makes one appreciate the masterpiece that was the prequel trilogy.
